about_the_game:
in General :

You're ex-military, you and your team were sent on a secret mission after 10 years of non-service, to check out an island where nuclear weapons and radiation were allegedly being tested, after you land badly on the island you have to face hunger, thirst, cold, but most of all fear, you have to make tools, build shelters and try to SURVIVE. You are the only survivor in the whole team and you try to understand the island.

Procedural vital system :


- For example to keep from getting cold, just start running to keep warm or you need to find a heat source like fire or armor or your health will decrease
- when you are in a scary situation, your fear rises and hunger is decreasing faster
- each level procedurally increases the maximum level of hunger and thirst
- etc...

Interesting inventory and crafting :


Each item has specific place, like in game the forest...

About me and team:


Hi, i am Honza Záruba, i am 16 years old and I've been interested in games since I was little, but I didn't always want to just play games but also create them... since 2018 I've been interested in game development in unity engine so at the end of 2022 I decided to do this... it's not as I expected but it's enjoyble and that's the main thing, I want to share it with you and collect feedbacks for future updates :) Thanks for all!

We also have a lot of testers, art designers and story creators (Daniela Drábková, Miroul, Jamal, Filip, etc...)
detailed_description:
in General :

You're ex-military, you and your team were sent on a secret mission after 10 years of non-service, to check out an island where nuclear weapons and radiation were allegedly being tested, after you land badly on the island you have to face hunger, thirst, cold, but most of all fear, you have to make tools, build shelters and try to SURVIVE. You are the only survivor in the whole team and you try to understand the island.

Procedural vital system :


- For example to keep from getting cold, just start running to keep warm or you need to find a heat source like fire or armor or your health will decrease
- when you are in a scary situation, your fear rises and hunger is decreasing faster
- each level procedurally increases the maximum level of hunger and thirst
- etc...

Interesting inventory and crafting :


Each item has specific place, like in game the forest...

About me and team:


Hi, i am Honza Záruba, i am 16 years old and I've been interested in games since I was little, but I didn't always want to just play games but also create them... since 2018 I've been interested in game development in unity engine so at the end of 2022 I decided to do this... it's not as I expected but it's enjoyble and that's the main thing, I want to share it with you and collect feedbacks for future updates :) Thanks for all!

We also have a lot of testers, art designers and story creators (Daniela Drábková, Miroul, Jamal, Filip, etc...)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan 10.11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Wrong Landing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Wrong Landing is free to play survival open world story horror game where you shipwrecked on a deserted island and try to survive the hunger, cold, fear and much more!
